name: amzs-master
description: AMZS Master Monorepo - A collection of subprojects including AI Tools, Backend Services, and Vue UI

scripts.serve:dev: concurrently "npx serve . -l 5500" "npm run start --workspace=ai-tools -p 3000" "npm run start --workspace=qe-manual -- -p 3001"
scripts.test:all: npm run test:ai-tools && npm run test:backend && npm run test:vue

author: AMZS Team
